title: A Place of dreams: National Air and Space Museum
creator_credit: Peter S Vogt and Learning Corporation of America
brief_description: An examination of the Smithsonian Institute, home of America’s early planes. Shows through the use of early film and still photographs, the Wright Brothers’ early failures and successes; looks at the restoration of old planes at the museum; and presents a history of the development of flight in the United States. Presented by Cliff Robertson. Suitable for middle and upper secondary levels.
